top_questions.text: A sequential data file called "list.dat" has stored data under the field heading items name, quantity and rate. Write a program to update all the records by increasing the rate by 10%.
Define Encryption and Decryption. f) What is RDBMS? Write any two examples. g) Write the functions of Primary key. h) What is query? Write its type. i) Define Form and Report.

Write down the output of the given program. Show with dry run in table. [3] DECLARE FUNCTION PRE(A) CLS A=12345 S=PRE(A) PRINT S END FUNCTION PRE(A) WHILE A <> 0 R = A MOD 10 S = S + R A = A \ 10 WEND PRE = S END FUNCTION
